title: 6 Days Desert Trek from Marrakech
description: Experience the magic of the Sahara Desert with camel treks, overnight camping, and breathtaking Atlas Mountain landscapes

itinerary.title: Marrakech - Ouarzazate - Plateau of Faija
itinerary.description: Morning departure from Marrakech, crossing the Tichka Pass. Visit Ouarzazate and continue to the Draa Valley. Discover ancient ksars and Zagora before reaching the Faija plateau to meet our camel drivers. Overnight in desert tents.

itinerary.title: Faija Plateau - Oued Lemhasser
itinerary.description: Trek through the Faija pass with panoramic views. Explore the mountainous desert with its black mountains and Bedouin settlements. Lunch at Regabi wells. Camp near wadi Lemhasser. 6 hours walking.

itinerary.title: Oued Lemhasser - Chegaga Dunes
itinerary.description: Traverse a beautiful desert valley and vast stone plateau. Witness magnificent views of the Chegaga dunes. Evening arrival at the dunes with stunning sunset views. Overnight in desert camp. 6 hours walking.

itinerary.title: Chegaga Dunes - Bougarn Dunes
itinerary.description: Explore Erg Chegaga's small dunes near Bani Mountain. Lunch under tamaris trees. Continue to the secluded Bouguern dunes. Evening campfire under the stars. 5.5 hours walking.

itinerary.title: Bougarn Dunes - Oued Naam Dunes
itinerary.description: Early start to watch the sunrise. Cross flat desert terrain and stone plateaus. Water refill at desert well. Evening at Oued NÃ¢am dunes where nomad caravans gather. 5.5 hours walking.

itinerary.title: Oued Naam - Zagora - Marrakech
itinerary.description: Final desert morning. Farewell to camel drivers team. 4x4 drive to Ouarzazate, crossing High Atlas via Tizi-N-Tichka pass to Marrakech. 7-hour drive.

title: 7 Days Morocco Discovery
description: From Marrakech to Fes through desert landscapes, historic sites, and the blue pearl Chefchaouen

itinerary.title: Marrakech - Atlas Mountains - Dades Valley
itinerary.description: Cross High Atlas Mountains via Tizi N-Tichka. Visit UNESCO site Ait Ben Haddou and Ouarzazate film studios. Continue through Valley of Roses to Dades Valley. Overnight in hotel/kasbah.

itinerary.title: Dades Valley - Merzouga Desert
itinerary.description: Journey through Berber villages to Merzouga Desert. Visit Tinjdad and Erfoud. Camel trek into sand dunes. Watch sunset from high dunes. Overnight in desert camp with traditional music.

itinerary.title: Merzouga - Midelt - Fes
itinerary.description: Travel through Tafilalet palm grove and Ziz valley. Stop at Midelt for lunch. Visit cedar forests with Barbary apes. See Ifrane 'Little Switzerland' before arriving in Fes.

itinerary.title: Exploring Fez
itinerary.description: Full day exploring Fes medina with local guide. Visit ancient souks, tanneries, Al Quaraouiyine University, and artisan quarters. Experience traditional crafts and architecture.

itinerary.title: Fes - Chefchaouen
itinerary.description: Drive to the beautiful blue city of Chefchaouen in Rif Mountains. Explore its picturesque blue-washed streets and medina. Overnight in local riad.

itinerary.title: Chefchaouen - Volubilis - Meknes
itinerary.description: Visit Roman ruins of Volubilis and the imperial city of Meknes. Explore historic sites and traditional markets. Return to Chefchaouen.

itinerary.title: Return to Marrakech/Casablanca
itinerary.description: Morning in Chefchaouen before departing to your choice of Marrakech or Casablanca for departure.

title: 9 Days Morocco Complete Tour
description: Comprehensive journey from Casablanca to Marrakech covering imperial cities and desert landscapes

itinerary.title: Welcome to Casablanca
itinerary.description: Arrival in Casablanca. Airport transfer to hotel. Free time to relax or explore the city depending on arrival time.

itinerary.title: Casablanca - Rabat - Chefchaouen
itinerary.description: Visit Hassan II Mosque. Explore Rabat's highlights including Bab Challah and Mohammed V Mausoleum. Continue to blue city of Chefchaouen.

itinerary.title: Chefchaouen - Volubilis - Fes
itinerary.description: Morning in Chefchaouen. Visit Roman ruins of Volubilis and imperial city of Meknes. Evening arrival in Fes.

itinerary.title: Exploring Fes
itinerary.description: Full day guided tour of Fes medina. Visit Royal Palace, ancient souks, tanneries, and historic madrasas. Experience local crafts and culture.

itinerary.title: Fes - Ifrane - Merzouga Desert
itinerary.description: Journey through Middle Atlas Mountains. Visit Ifrane and cedar forests. Cross Ziz Valley to Merzouga. Camel trek to desert camp.

itinerary.title: Merzouga - Todra Gorges - Dades Valley
itinerary.description: Desert sunrise. Visit Todra Gorges and enjoy scenic landscapes. Overnight in Dades Valley with stunning views.

itinerary.title: Dades - Ouarzazate - Marrakech
itinerary.description: Travel through Valley of Roses. Visit Ait Ben Haddou Kasbah. Cross High Atlas Mountains to Marrakech.

itinerary.title: Marrakech City Tour
itinerary.description: Explore Marrakech highlights: Majorelle Gardens, Koutoubia Mosque, Saadian Tombs, and traditional souks.

itinerary.title: Departure Day
itinerary.description: Transfer to airport for departure flight from either Casablanca or Marrakech.

title: 10 Days Morocco Grand Tour
description: Complete exploration from Marrakech to Casablanca covering deserts, mountains, and historic cities

itinerary.title: Welcome to Marrakech
itinerary.description: Airport transfer to accommodation. Free time to explore Jemaa el Fnaa square and the souks.

itinerary.title: Marrakech Guided Tour
itinerary.description: Full day exploring Marrakech with official guide. Visit Koutoubia Mosque, Medina, souks, Ali Ben Youssef Koranic school, and Majorelle Gardens.

itinerary.title: Marrakech - Ait Benhaddou - Dades Gorge
itinerary.description: Cross Atlas Mountains to UNESCO site Ait Ben Haddou. Visit Ouarzazate film studios. Continue to Valley of Roses and Dades Gorge.

itinerary.title: Dades - Todra - Merzouga Desert
itinerary.description: Visit Todra Gorge. Continue through Ziz Valley to Erfoud. Camel trek into Merzouga desert for overnight camp experience.

itinerary.title: Merzouga - Midelt - Fes
itinerary.description: Desert sunrise. Travel through Atlas Mountains with stops in Midelt and Azrou cedar forest. Arrive in Fes.

itinerary.title: Exploring Fes
itinerary.description: Guided tour of Fes including Royal Palace, Jewish quarter, ancient medina, and traditional craft demonstrations.

itinerary.title: Fes - Chefchaouen
itinerary.description: Travel to the blue city of Chefchaouen in the Rif Mountains. Afternoon exploring the unique blue-painted medina.

itinerary.title: Chefchaouen - Rabat - Casablanca
itinerary.description: Morning in Chefchaouen. Visit Rabat's main sights. Continue to Casablanca for overnight stay.

itinerary.title: Casablanca - Marrakech
itinerary.description: Visit Hassan II Mosque and Casablanca highlights. Afternoon return to Marrakech.

itinerary.title: Departure Day
itinerary.description: Transfer to Marrakech airport for departure flight.

title: 12 Days Southern Morocco Adventure
description: In-depth exploration of Southern Morocco from Essaouira to Sahara Desert

itinerary.title: Marrakech - Essaouira
itinerary.description: Drive through argan and olive groves to coastal Essaouira. Explore the port, ramparts, and colorful medina.

itinerary.title: Essaouira - Tiznit - Aglou Beach
itinerary.description: Scenic coastal drive past fishing villages to Aglou Beach.

itinerary.title: Oued Massa - Tiznit
itinerary.description: Visit Massa wadi bird reserve. Explore Tiznit medina and jewelry quarter.

itinerary.title: Mirleft - Sidi Ifni - Tighmert
itinerary.description: Coastal journey to Spanish-influenced Sidi Ifni. Night in Tighmert oasis.

itinerary.title: Tan Tan - Guelmim - Tighmert
itinerary.description: Explore Tan Tan beach and historic Guelmim market town.

itinerary.title: Guelmim - Tafraoute
itinerary.description: Journey to Anti-Atlas mountains and picturesque Tafraoute.

itinerary.title: Ait Mansour Gorges
itinerary.description: Full day exploring the spectacular Ait Mansour gorges.

itinerary.title: Tata - Foum Zguid
itinerary.description: Visit pink oasis of Tata. Continue to desert gateway Foum Zguid.

itinerary.title: Chigaga Desert
itinerary.description: Cross dried Iriqui lake to Chigaga dunes. Camel trek to desert camp.

itinerary.title: M'hamid - Zagora
itinerary.description: Desert track to M'hamid. Visit Tamgroute's Quranic library and pottery. Night in Zagora.

itinerary.title: Zagora - Ouarzazate
itinerary.description: Explore Draa Valley and Tamnougalte kasbah. Continue to Ouarzazate.

itinerary.title: Ait Ben Haddou - Marrakech
itinerary.description: Visit UNESCO site Ait Ben Haddou. Return to Marrakech via Atlas Mountains.

title: 7 Days Imperial Cities & Blue Pearl
description: Cultural journey through Morocco's imperial cities and Chefchaouen

itinerary.title: Casablanca - Rabat - Chefchaouen
itinerary.description: Visit Hassan II Mosque. Explore Rabat's sites including Chellah Necropolis and Kasbah des Oudaias. Evening in Chefchaouen.

itinerary.title: Chefchaouen - Volubilis - Meknes - Fes
itinerary.description: Morning in Chefchaouen. Visit Roman ruins of Volubilis and imperial city of Meknes. Continue to Fes.

itinerary.title: Exploring Fes Medina
itinerary.description: Full day guided tour of Fes including ancient medina, souks, tanneries, and historical monuments. Visit famous leather tanneries and artisan workshops.

itinerary.title: Fes - Merzouga Desert
itinerary.description: Cross Middle Atlas Mountains through Ifrane and cedar forests. Pass Ziz Valley to reach Merzouga. Sunset camel trek to desert camp.

itinerary.title: Merzouga - Todra - Dades
itinerary.description: Desert sunrise. Visit Todra Gorge and Dades Valley. Experience stunning mountain scenery and historic kasbahs.

itinerary.title: Dades - Ait Benhaddou - Marrakech
itinerary.description: Visit Rose Valley and Ait Benhaddou kasbah. Cross High Atlas Mountains to reach Marrakech.

itinerary.title: Marrakech - Departure
itinerary.description: Explore Marrakech's main square and souks. Transfer to airport for departure to Marrakech or Casablanca.
